<div class="row align-items-start">
<div class="col-10">
This dashboard shows the daily traffic variation (departures + arrivals) for the main European airports compared to 2019 [^1]. <br> 
Observed variations are the result of many different factors including: COVID-19, Overall economic downturn, Failure of airlines, ANSPs' disruptions,  Airports' disruptions, Traffic variation in 2019.
<ul>
  <li>The graphics on the right present the daily evolution, the average evolution of each week (starting on Mondays) and the moving average over the last 7 days.</li>
</ul>
</div>
